Description: Bosch Global Software Technologies Private Limited is a 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH, one of the world's leading global supplier of technology and services, offering end-to-end Engineering, IT and Business Solutions. With over 22,700 associates, it’s the largest software development center of Bosch, outside Germany, indicating that it is the Technology Powerhouse of Bosch in India with a global footprint and presence in the US, Europe and the Asia Pacific region.Software Engineer experience in C# Backend DevelopmentSkill Set required:· C# Developer· Experience in C# Backend and core business logic development· In depth understanding of Object-oriented analysis and design (OOAD)· Experience in SQL Server· Experience working with Unified Modeling Language (UML) diagrams· Should be able to :o Understand UML designso Come up with low level design from a problem statemento Quickly learn and adapt new and emerging technologieso Quickly pick up domain concepts· Knowledge on WPF, Python and JavaScript will be an added advantage· Automotive knowledge will be an added advantage· Team player with strong communication skillsResponsibility:· Develop high quality software design· Develop tools and applications by producing clean, efficient code· Review and debug code· Maintain and improve performance of existing software· Independently complete critical software components within stipulated time· Analysis of requirements and transfer of requirements into specification· To come up with Out of the box solutions· Participate in product breakdown and effort estimationB.E/B.Tech2-5 yearsJob Details
